name: SecurityClearanceLevel

clearanceLevel.description: Security clearance level (internal, confidential, restricted, top-secret)

holderName.description: Full name of the credential holder

holderUniqueId.description: Unique identifier for the credential holder

cryptographicKeys.description: Dual cryptographic key pair for signing and encryption

ed25519PublicKey.description: Ed25519 public key for digital signatures (base64url encoded, 32 bytes)

ed25519Fingerprint.description: SHA-256 fingerprint of Ed25519 public key (XX:XX:... format)

x25519PublicKey.description: X25519 public key for encryption (base64url encoded, 32 bytes)

x25519Fingerprint.description: SHA-256 fingerprint of X25519 public key (XX:XX:... format)

issuedDate.description: Date when the clearance was issued (YYYY-MM-DD)

clearanceId.description: Unique identifier for this clearance credential

issuingAuthority.description: Name of the authority that issued this clearance

requiresMultiFactorAuth.description: Whether multi-factor authentication is required for this clearance level

allowsDigitalSigning.description: Whether this clearance allows digital document signing

allowsEncryption.description: Whether this clearance allows encrypted communications
